tool_description: Retrieves current and historical inventory levels, stock movements, and availability metrics for product catalog management and performance analysis.

product_ids.description: List of product IDs to check inventory for

include_history.description: Whether to include historical inventory data

error_messages: Product IDs not found: One or more product IDs do not exist in the inventory system.
Invalid warehouse location: One or more warehouse locations are not recognized.
Access denied: Insufficient permissions to access inventory data for specified locations.
usage: Provide product_ids array, optionally set include_history to true for historical data and specify warehouse_locations for location-specific inventory. Returns current stock levels and movement data.

current_stock_levels.description: Current inventory quantities for each product

out_of_stock_products.description: List of product IDs currently out of stock
